summary: Completed comprehensive CMS infrastructure implementation for Hooshex platform. Installed and configured SEO (ralphjsmit/laravel-filament-seo), Media Library (awcodes/filament-curator), Tags (spatie/laravel-tags), and Sitemap (spatie/laravel-sitemap) packages. Created/refined 7 domain models (AiTool, Course, Product, News, Page, Teacher, Career) with migrations and HasSEO trait. Built Filament Resources with tabbed forms (General, Content, Taxonomy, SEO) for all models. Implemented SitemapController with legacy WordPress URL structure support. Added frontend SEO injection in layout and PageController for dynamic content block rendering. All models now support structured data, SEO metadata, and taxonomy relationships.
current_status: Phase 1-5 complete. All packages installed and configured. All models created with migrations. All Filament Resources created with SEO tabs. SitemapController implemented with legacy URL routes. Frontend SEO injection and PageController ready. Next steps: Run migrations, test Filament admin panel, implement page block components (hero, features, content), and configure SEO package settings.
